TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessagingFactory extends Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.ClientEntity
Public MustInherit Class MessagingFactory Inherits ClientEntity

Docs.summary: The MessagingFactory class is the anchor class used for run time operations to send and receive to and from queues, topics, or subscriptions.
Docs.remarks: Please note that any member method with CreateXXXClient, such as CreateQueueClient, does not create a new entity in the namespace. It only gets handle to an existing entity created earlier using the . If these entities does not exist in the namespace, you will get an exception.
